class accessCeramics.works.models.Temperature(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Previous temperature of the work, e.g. when fired in a kiln.

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
value¶

a measurement.measures.Temperature of the work

class accessCeramics.works.models.Work(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

A creative work exhibited in accessCeramics.

DISTANCE_CHOICES = (('m', 'm'), ('cm', 'cm'), ('in', 'in'), ('ft', 'ft'))¶

list of available units for height/width/depth measurements

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
created_at¶

timestamp when work was created in the database

creators¶

usernames of accessCeramics users who created the work, required

credits¶

credit line for the work

date¶

date associated with the work, YYYY format, required

depth¶

a measurement.measures.Distance representing the depth of the work

description¶

description of the work or artist’s statement

height¶

a measurement.measures.Distance representing the height of the work

materials¶

one or many Material associated with the work

modified_at¶

timestamp when work was last modified in the database

techniques¶

one or many Technique associated with the work

temperatures¶

one or many Temperature associated with the work

title¶

title of the work, maximum 500 characters, required

width¶

a measurement.measures.Distance representing the width of the work

work_types¶

one or many WorkType associated with the work

class accessCeramics.works.models.WorkType(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

The type or function of a work, e.g. “vase”.

exception DoesNotExist¶
exception MultipleObjectsReturned¶
name¶

name of the work type

Views¶

Forms¶

Manage Commands¶

Works Import¶

This script will load a JSON-format file containing accessCeramics records into the database. It expects the file to contain an array of objects with keys corresponding to the field names of the Work model. Multivalued fields should be represented as arrays of strings. Measurement fields should be represented as floating point values in inches. Empty fields should use the JSON value none.
